column5: Well guys and gals the Lower Grand is still on Fire for Walleye  As well as the Lake Erie off Port Maitland ...These 2 guys got 7 in a couple hours before getting blowin off the Lake ...The Derby is on if your fishing Walleye on Lake Erie you may wana get in on the Derny its 2 months long ...  Took out Zach last night all i heard was Fish-On  and Fish-On  Also i built a place to get Pictures and clean your Fish  before you head home ...good luck on Erie

Hey Steve, the guys in the 1st pic are me(kuha) and my good buddy Conchead. Thanks for posting it and also thanks for providing such a good and cheap place to launch and buy bait. Just dont be telling anyone our secrets on how to catch those beauties. Mika
sweet!  hopefully i can get out there soon!
Nice! Good to see the little guy having a blast. Grand river seems to be producing some good pickerel this year. Thanks for the update.
thanks for the report i have heard fishing has been good dow there this year.  cheers!

Nice bunch of eyes there  You won't see me around for at least another week to a week and a half, Heading South on the weekend so I guess I'm going to miss some grand river fishing but may be casting a line on the Grand Strand.

Yes the river is in fine shape for walleye all sorts of year classes ..i think this year is going to be one of the best years for Walleye yet ..the river holds Walleye all year round witch makes it very nice for those days you can not get out onto Lake Erie ..another bonus to save a days fishing if the Lake is rough fish the Grand ..
Sweet.... Zach sure had a blast Nice eyes btw. Thansk for sharing. Leetchman
